attributes.action: Petition to bring back capital punishment for pedophiles, rapists and murderers.
attributes.additional_details: Pedophiles and rapists are mentally ill humans which cannot be rehabilitated. They do not deserve to walk on the face of the earth as they aren’t okay in the head. Punishment for these humans isn’t harsh enough and their sentence should be death. If you do not agree with this you are openly supporting pedophiles and rapists. As for murderers we can all agree that taking someone’s life is extremely wrong and anyone that does it deserves to die themselves.
attributes.background: I want the Government to bring back Capital Punishment for pedophiles, rapists and murderers as they are menaces to society.
